name: PetLip Social Networking Community
short_description:
Social network for meeting new people, with 120,000 users in a year worldwide. The concept aims to completely change the way people meet online.

PetLip explored new horizons in social network, with advanced approach in building social ties. It defined itself as a social network, with games, and a meeting section in tow steps: (friends, search, chat, photos, profile, meetme, gift, drink, tags, etc.) and pets game and meeting people near you suggestions.

The differentiation lies
1) The combination of full social network and meet new people
2) The addition of trying to go beyond first contact with pet game and psychology (poker game made with psychologists enable people who want to discover each other better).

The website needs a better design, easier navigation and some better code in some areas. It can be a great alternative to existing websites and can offer a better way to connect and know people online.
summary: PetLip is a Social network for meeting new people with friends!
